trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Sigun Ul is looking for fun.
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_TODO_00<tab>Speak with pixies.
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Sigun Ul.
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_000<tab>Mortals in our village, how exciting! Tell me, what is your name?
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_001<tab><var 29 EB02 /var>, a lovely name. But <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> names are lovely too!

TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_002<tab>Ah, but here's an idea! I want you to go and speak with my fellows. Ask them what their names mean. When you're done, return hither and we'll have some fun. Tee hee hee!
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_003<tab>Go around the village and ask my fellows what their names mean. When you're done, return hither and we'll have some fun!

TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_JULFEO_000_010<tab>You wish to know the meaning of my name? Well, Jul is yew and Feo is treasure! Together it means “a treasure beneath the yew”! Beautiful, even if I do say so myself!
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_JULFEO_000_011<tab>Remember, Jul is yew and Feo is treasure! Together it means “a treasure beneath the yew”! Beautiful, even if I do say so myself!

TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_IALASUL_000_012<tab>My name is Iala Sul. Separately, the words mean the turn of the seasons and flower. Together, they make me “a flower that blooms always.” Precious, I'm sure you'll agree.
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_IALASUL_000_013<tab>A flower that blooms always─that is my name in your tongue. Precious, I'm sure you'll agree.
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_AENCUIN_000_014<tab>I'm Aenc Uin! Water and happiness! Happiness in the water! And I'm very happy now! Why? Because you're here! Oh, how shall we play? There are so many ways!
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_AENCUIN_000_015<tab>Water and happiness! Happiness in the water! Oh, I'll think of a game for us to play soon! And then we'll have a jolly good time!
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_020<tab>Welcome back! I hope you were paying attention to my fellows, because I'm going to test you on the meaning of our names!
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_021<tab>First question! Who is the pixie whose name means a treasure beneath the yew?
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_Q1_000_000<tab>Which pixie's name means a treasure beneath the yew?
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_A1_000_001<tab>Jul Feo.
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_A1_000_002<tab>Iala Sul.
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_A1_000_003<tab>Aenc Uin.
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_022<tab>I see, I see... Right, second question. The pixie whose name means a flower that blooms always─where were they playing?
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_Q2_000_000<tab>Where was a flower that blooms always?
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_A2_000_001<tab>By the aetheryte.
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_A2_000_002<tab>By the meadow.
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_A2_000_003<tab>By the lake.

TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_023<tab>Boo, you got <var 1A 02 /var>both<var 1A 01 /var> answers wrong! But I'm a kind pixie, so I'll give you another chance. Go and speak with my fellows once more, and this time mark their words well, yes?
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_024<tab>Hmmm, one out of two isn't terrible, I suppose. All right, by way of a reward, I shall tell you more about our names!
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_025<tab>Huzzah, you got both answers correct! You were clearly paying attention, and by way of a reward, I shall tell you more about our names!
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_026<tab>You see, our names are composed of special runes of power. They are chosen to best represent our nature, and the spark of life that abides in us.
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_027<tab>If I were to name you by our custom, it would be... Ooh, this is a tough one! Sigun Tyr, perhaps...or Ul Tyr─it really could go either way!
TEXT_LUCKZC009_03392_SIGUNUL_000_028<tab>You wish to know the meaning, do you? Ah, but where's the fun in just telling you? You'll have to find out for yourself! Tee hee!
